name: Globe Lunch
description: Indulge in a nutritious and fulfilling 'Globe Lunch' that's perfect for anyone looking to maintain a healthy diet without compromising on taste. This dish packs a high-protein and low-carb punch, featuring a succulently roasted chicken breast paired with sautéed string beans and a side of corn on the cob. It's an ideal meal for those seeking healthy, delicious options that are low in sugar.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C) for roasting the chicken breast.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper, and place it on a baking tray.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Roast the chicken breast in the preheated oven until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C), about 25-30 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: While the chicken is roasting, trim the ends off the string beans.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a pan over medium heat and sauté the string beans with a bit of olive oil until tender, about 5-7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to a boil and cook the corn on the cob until tender, about 5-8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the roasted chicken breast and serve it alongside the sautéed string beans and boiled corn on the cob.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
